name: Lizard Wizard: "Never Trust The Talking Bean"
name_original: Lizard Wizard: "Never Trust The Talking Bean"
description:
*EDIT* Fixed the gamebreaking bugs!
This was made as a submission for the mashup game jam, made in 72 hours.
Controls:

WASD to move around

Space to jump

You can double jump after the first level

F can pick up and drop objects

You can only pick up shapes that have been shrunk to their smallest size

You play as a Lizard, who is turned into a wizard by an evil sentient bean stalk.

There is some rushed game jam jank in there. If you lose some cubes through the floor... :( you miiiggghhhttt have to restart.
We had voice acting, but it's not playing for some reason, as well as some collisions that aren't working correctly...
